title: Windows 10- Newest Patch.
body: So for the past few hours I've been trying to get league to work, I've run into issues. I've done everything I've seen to fix this issue, such as running the application as admin, deleting certain files, uninstalling and changing the compatibility. I've already looked at the thread that gives solutions and none of them are catering to my problem. When I launch league it comes up with the logo and nothing happens after that, is there anyone who has encountered this problem and knows a fix?

replies.body: Thanks for the steps you've taken so far to troubleshoot this!  The issue you're having might be a problem with your OS blocking the patcher from launching.  As Rineyy suggested, our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide has some steps to get this fixed up for you.  Hopefully this will get you back in the game, but let me know if you come across any problems!

That didn't fix it for me. I used the Hextech Repair Tool and forced it to repatch League and now it's starting to patch for me.

Finished patching and all works perfectly fine now

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
